text: Jimmy Butler III (born September 14, 1989) is an American professional basketball player who got drafted 30th overall in 2011 to the Chicago Bulls. Butler played for the Bulls from 2011–2017. He later played for the Minnesota Timberwolves and Philadelphia 76ers. He is currently playing for the Miami Heat, and later, the Golden State Warriors of the NBA. Butler was born on September 14, 1989 in Houston, Texas. He studied at Tomball High School. Then went to Tyler Junior College from 2007–2008. After that, he went to Marquette University from 2008–2011. Butler is among few NBA players of his era to play four years in college. ==References== ==Other websites== *Big East for Jimmy Butler *Jimmy Butler bio-GoMarquette.com Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Businesspeople from Houston Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Miami Heat players Category:Minnesota Timberwolves players Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Houston
title: Jimmy Butler
